thread.title: Charming hotel, charming neighborhood
thread.title_full: Charming hotel, charming neighborhood - Review of Hotel Parc St. Severin - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: moose528
title: Charming hotel, charming neighborhood
text: My wife and I spent several days in Paris during our most recent Europe Trip! Hotel is situated in a great little neighborhood loaded with great shops and restaurants. Short and I mean short walk to Notre Dame, easy access to the Metro and if you have the energy walking distance from the best Paris has to offer. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Room was small but clean and certainly priced right. This hotel was perfect for our needs and I would recommend it to anyone traveling to Paris.
